DOC.detailed_description: Preliminary phase : Current status subject . During phase update systematic search research topic . The literature search databases MEDLINE , SCOPUS , CINAHL , WoS among others . Data Collection : The source collection primary data personal interview participant primer health pregnant and/or medical history . Interview first visit : - Collect socioeconomic health data participant : age , parity , weight , BMI , smoke habit , drug use , profession/occupation , education level , physical activity pattern prior pregnancy . - Degree overall health perception . - Assess risk accord guide American College Obstetricians Gynecologists . - Obtaining informed agree participate study consent . - Give information pack exercise investigator perform well control make session , general rule practice physical activity . Execution : Classes hold morning hour preferable 10 11 o'clock morning caloric intake adequate hydration . Every participant carry water bottle session take place , well adequate clothing , bath suit , hat , glass proper footwear include prevent fall . Before class dynamic follow sign make exercise stop , every participant know take pulse level carotid artery may recall , different time central activity take frequency heart , general rule must able hold conversation without much difficulty perform exercise , performance properly hydrate accord need one particular . 1 . DOC.criteria: Do suffer absolute contraindication accord American College Obstetricians Gynecologists . If relative contraindication , participation intervention group favorable report participant obstetrician . To know swim . To sign informed consent participate research consent . Absolute contraindication aerobic exercise pregnancy . Restrictive lung disease . Heart disease hemodynamic consequence . Incompetent cervix/cerclage . Multiple gestation preterm labor . Persistent bleed second third trimester bleeding . Previa 26 week gestation . Preterm birth current pregnancy . Rupture membrane . Pregnancyinduced hypertension . Relative contraindication aerobic exercise pregnancy . Severe anemia . Cardiac arrhythmia maternal unevaluated . Chronic Bronchitis . Type I diabetes poorly control . Extreme morbid obesity . Under extreme weight ( BMI < 12 ) . History extremely sedentary life style . Intrauterine growth restriction current pregnancy . Poorly control hypertension / preeclampsia . Orthopedic limitation . Poorly controlled seizure disorder . Poorly control Thyroid disease . Heavy smoker .
